name: Horseshoe Crab Eggs Benedict
description:
You are playing as a Horseshoe Crab, ane of the remaining prehistoric dinosaur-era species that are still alive today.  The importance of this species to the bird life and even to human life is too important to go unnoticed. Everyone should be made aware of this super ugly but super important crab and why we have to appreciate and do what we can to preserve it's existence.

PLease read more about this species here:

http://www.endangeredspeciesinternational.org/horseshoecrabs.html

Cover Image was taken from:

http://seaaroundyou.com
